meanings.definition: A type of traditional music from Mexico.
meanings.sent1: The bandas played lively music at the festival.
meanings.sent2: I love listening to the bandas on my way to work.
meanings.sent3: The bandas decided to have a dance-off with the mariachi band.
meanings.sent4: The bandas' melodies floated through the air like colorful butterflies.
meanings.sent5: The bandas' rhythms were as vibrant as a fiesta.

meanings.definition: A group of musicians who perform together.
meanings.sent1: The bandas rehearsed for hours before the big concert.
meanings.sent2: The bandas received a standing ovation for their performance.
meanings.sent3: The bandas wore matching outfits for their gig.
meanings.sent4: The bandas harmonized like a choir of angels.
meanings.sent5: The bandas' energy on stage was contagious.

meanings.definition: A strip of cloth used for binding or tying.
meanings.sent1: She used a banda to tie back her hair.
meanings.sent2: The banda kept the books neatly bundled together.
meanings.sent3: He jokingly pretended the banda was a superhero cape.
meanings.sent4: The banda held the package securely in place.
meanings.sent5: The colorful banda added a pop of color to her outfit.
